lines: 1. Natayayire ar'Omonene,Bono ngocha nde nka;Nganetie ng'irane as'obuya,Bono ngocha nde nka.
Ee ngocha nde,Tata ngocha nde,Bono ngocha nde nka;Ee ngochande,Tata ngocha nde,Bono ngocha nde nka.
2. Narosire n'ens'eye y'ebibe,Bono ngocha nde nka;Omotoria nang'ariganie nka.Bono ngocha nde nka.
3. 'Manyir' Omotoria nantimokie,Bono ngocha nde nka;Ko nganetie gotimok'as'are,Bono ngocha nde nka.
4. Nasabire nonya nobosomba,Bono ngocha nde nka;Gicha nyor'obuya bw'Omotoria,Bono ngocha nde nka.
5. Togi'Omonene Omotori'one,Bono ngocha nde nka;'Ganyet'ang'ariganie nch'omobe,Bono ngocha nde nka.
